vk.utils.task_manager module¶

class vk.utils.task_manager.TaskManager(loop: asyncio.events.AbstractEventLoop)¶

Bases: object

Task manager represent to user high-level API of asyncio interface (Less part :))

add_task(task: Callable)¶

Add task to loop when loop don`t started.

Parameters

task – coroutine for run in loop

Returns

close()¶

Close event loop manually

>>> task_manager.close()
:return:
run(*, on_shutdown: Callable = None, on_startup: Callable = None, asyncio_debug_mode: bool = False, auto_reload: bool = False)¶

Method which run event loop

Parameters

  • auto_reload – auto reload code when changes

  • on_shutdown – coroutine which runned after complete tasks

  • on_startup – coroutine which runned before start main tasks

  • asyncio_debug_mode – asyncio debug mode state

Returns

run_task(task: Callable)¶

Create task in loop

>>> async def other_coro():
>>>    while True:
>>>        print("hello, my friend!")
>>>        await asyncio.sleep(5)

>>> async def my_pretty_coro():
>>>    task_manager.run_task(other_coro)
>>>    return True
Parameters

task –

Returns
